attributes.action: stand down as prime minister and let THE STIG take the wheel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I request that the prime minister let the stig have a go behind the wheel. if clarkson does the brainy work , richard hammond plays with the office toys and james may drinks and talks about wine allday, then maybe we would have a better and more interesting country. god save the stig and clarkson and all his mates ! god save the uk

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
